features: No Assembly Required : The simple folding computer desk is pre-assembly, no assembly needed, just take it out and open it to work immediately
Space Saving Folding Desk: The small desk can be folded in the corner when not use, after folding, the width is just 1 inch, easy for you to store and transport
Folding Computer Desk with Shelf: This desk designed with a shelf on the desktop offering great storage space for your monitor, books, plants, small things, etc, maximize your space

Unfolded Dimension: 22 inches from the wall to the desk edge, 27.5 inches from the floor to the main desk top. It is a great choice if you work from home or in limited small space and need to create a nice little cozy work space
Portable Folding Desk: Collapsible desk is light and sturdy, easily take it from bedroom to any other room,you could use it beside bed,sofa,living room etc,give you flexibility

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Small Spaces
reviews.reviewText: This table is perfect for small spaces and folds nearly flat so it easily slides under a bed, or behind the door when not in use. No assembly required, it's very sturdy, stylish and easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Folding Computer Desk!
reviews.reviewText: I'm absolutely thrilled with this small folding computer desk – it's truly a game-changer for my workspace! The compact design is perfect for my limited space, and the folding feature adds a level of versatility that I didn't know I needed. Setting it up was a breeze; it's incredibly user-friendly and doesn't require any complex assembly.The desk might be small in size, but it's big on functionality. The surface area is just right for my laptop, notebook, and a few essentials, keeping my workspace neat and organized. The built-in storage compartments are a thoughtful addition, helping me keep my pens, notepads, and other items within easy reach.Despite its compactness, the desk doesn't compromise on sturdiness. The materials used are of high quality, and it feels robust enough to support my work setup without any wobbling or concerns about stability.What truly sets this desk apart is its foldable design. When I need the extra space or want to use the area for a different purpose, I can simply fold it up and tuck it away. This feature has made my small living space much more adaptable and efficient.In terms of aesthetics, the desk's modern and minimalist design perfectly complements my décor. It's a functional piece that doesn't sacrifice style.Overall, I couldn't be happier with this small folding computer desk. It has transformed my workspace and made my life more organized and efficient. If you're looking for a space-saving solution that doesn't compromise on quality, functionality, or style, this desk is a fantastic choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The perfect folding desk. Zero assembly, ideal for small spaces, great quality and a sleek design. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: A Christmas gift for a person in Maine. He loves that it's so easy to put together, likes the look and said it is sturdy too. Great for apartment living style. Came by UPS even a earlier than stated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size--easy to set up. Works best against wall
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble--just open it up and its ready to go! The 27.3" size fits my 15" Macbook Air with a small mousepad and mouse. Its very sturdy (does not feel like it will collapse at all ) but it does tip easily if you bump the front as the weight is at the back of the desk. I think that if you set it against a wall this won't be an issue but you have to be careful if using it freestanding I bought this for a small kitchen table in my apartment but will also use it as a laptop desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love WFH You Also Will Love This Table
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended! Just as many reviewers have stated looks professional, sturdy, light weight and compact. Easy to tuck away when your done work/project or laptop use. Opens and folds easily with no assembly. Solid thick laminate textured surface of what appears to be durable high quality finish, stainless steel/aluminum legs and crossbars are well built and stable . Would buy again if another desk was needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and compacts nicely
reviews.reviewText: I like how it looks. You don’t have to build it, which is nice. All you do is fold it and unfold it. It’s easy to use and feels sturdy. It folds pretty flat and doesn’t take up too much room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, yet Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The foldability of this little table is what makes it so perfect for me! My house has a lot of rooms that I move around in, and having the ability to fold this table up and move it into whatever room I'm camped out in for the day is really great! I've used it as extra counter space when working in the kitchen. I used it as an actual computer desk during a recent Zoom meeting. I used it as a sort of TV tray to eat dinner on in front of the tv. It's a tad heavy because of the solid construction, but not so much that it can't be folded and moved easily. Plus, the fact that it does fold flat and can be stored out of site is great! I gave one to my SIL for Christmas, and she was so excited to be able to move it around her house to do her arts and crafts on from any room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solida, salvaspazio, si apre e chiude in 3 secondi
reviews.reviewText: Ho acquistato questa scrivania pieghevole per problemi di spazio nella mia casa e mi ha risolto il problema di quando devo lavorare da casa. È contenuta ma delle giuste dimensioni per lavorare con un pc portatile e il mouse, arriva già montata e, dopo le prime 3-4 volte che si usa e si capisce bene il meccanismo, si apre e chiude in tre secondi. Inoltre ha il vantaggio di poter essere portata in qualsiasi stanza e una volta piegata occupa poco spazio.

reviews.reviewTitle: acheté pour télétravail à la maison
reviews.reviewText: le bureau est super, facile à ranger et à déplier. je recommande

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This table is absolutely perfect for anyone with limited space who needs to work or study from home. No assembly required. Folds down flat when not in use but really sturdy when set up. Love the little shelf at the back, SO useful.
Me ha encantado,ideal para espacios pequeños.Se pliega fácilmente.

Jättebra bord. Använder det som skrivbord när jag jobbar hemifrån och behöver sitta i gästrummet. Det är enkelt att fälla upp och är stabilt. När det är ihopfällt är det väldigt platt vilket gör det enkelt att förvara. Mycket bättre än jag förväntat mig!
